name: Mini Racing: A Crazy Speedy Tiny Race - Free Edition
name_original: Mini Racing: A Crazy Speedy Tiny Race - Free Edition
description:
More than 20 cars to unlock, hours of fun in this tiny adventure.

It's a tiny miniature race, but being in a mini race doesn't mean that it's going to be easy.

There is a lot of competition, you'll start with your bronze cup cars, but by winning many race you'll be able to unlock all racing cars from your category, and later on you'll be able to unlock the silver cup cars division, gold cup and even the champion cup !

Pick up mini gold coin to build up your bank account for your news cars ! Unlock them all and become a champion.

The race will start slow at first but will get pretty fast and crowded, you'll have to be careful to avoid collision, but at the same time navigate through the race to pick up your precious gold coins.
